formatted_address: 83 Punggol Central, B1-12 Waterway Point West Wing, Singapore 828761
name: White Restaurant (Waterway Point)

reviews.text: Nice food and good service. Hua Fang serve our table with friendly gesture and smile. We had white beehoon and green dragon vegetables. We tried the limited Winter Solstice 2024 and it is very unique, not sweet and delicious.
The white bee hoon is nice. Especially the savory sauce that flavors up our taste buds. The vege and fish slides were well-cooked and tasty.

Ordered the traditional Hokkien mee and original white bee Hoon

Traditional Hokkien mee
‚úÖ wokhei üíØ
‚úÖ noodles is on the flat and thinner end and it‚Äôs not too soggy too! Really nicely drenched in dark sauce
‚úÖ not super sweet and salty

original white bee Hoon
‚úÖ super flavourful broth (sweet and not too salty)
‚úÖ the bee boon has soaked up most of the broth without it being too soggy

‚úÖ both dishes came with small scallops too
‚ùå v minimal pork slices though lol

Overall for this white bee hoon is nice. Bring my grandma go to celebrate her birthday.
Service is nice and morning peak have a 25% discount of the side dish. Bee hoon is not included for the discounts.
Not a bad white Mee Hoon, and some nice seafood, with Yam and Curry Chicken

vicinity: 83 Punggol Central, B1-12 Waterway Point West Wing
